title.rendered: 2024-2025 Parents and Guardians as Partners Webinar Series

content.rendered:
We are proud to offer our families the “Parents / Guardians as Partners” webinar series with Educational Consultant and Trainer Dr. Jennifer Bashant. Dr. Bashant is the founder of Building Better Futures LLC and provides a number of different opportunities for parents and educators to help children succeed in school.

This webinar series provides families, caregivers and staff access to all 10 live zoom webinars. Each session is recorded and will be available to watch for the remainder of the school year. Each live webinar will begin at 6:30 p.m.

2024-2025 Webinars

October 17, 2024: Strategies for Addressing School Avoidance or Refusal

Presented by Jennifer Bashant

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_XJeAHikJRrSt_0EaBaf3Yw

October 29, 2024: Strengthening Early Literacy Skills at Home

Presented by Renee Beaulieu

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_svpBW_sZS0SfoPJNWGo7yg

November 13, 2024: Vaping – Why Should I Be Concerned?

Presented by Patty Kilgore

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Aed5OLOnQsKyHIb68jB9UQ

November 25, 2024: Social Media – When is Too Soon and How Much is Too Much?

Presented by Jennifer Bashant

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_wqqhkr7FTJ2qWfm28C1BIQ

December 10, 2024:  Navigating Loss – A Guide to Bereavement for Families

Presented by Kim Perone

Link to Watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_26TcLrVQS96eatKovrM4mA

January 16, 2025 Modeling a Growth Mindset and Building Resilience

Presented by Jennifer Bashant

Link to Watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_6bnOeFqORiKmtmg5pusKlA

January 28, 2025 Ways to Encourage Open Communication with Your Teen

Presented by Bob Mackey

Link to Watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_V94ZTxclQ1GpeydNkhBdQw

February 11, 2025:  Is Finding a Work-Life Balance Really Possible?

Presented by Jennifer Bashant

Link to Watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_d4AcKCT7RdiZTJGIDZxLYQ

February 25, 2025: Increase Your Child’s Confidence, Curiosity, and Creativity by Encouraging the Development of Hobbies

Presented by Bennett Beaulieu

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_aucRZrIgTnmDPkB0d-mtHQ

March 11, 2025: Move from Helicopter Parenting to Lighthouse Parenting

Presented by Jennifer Bashant

Link to watch: https://us06web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_5jwfcT9HQKS7LQ8NsYmLYA
